mapper.select: SELECT a.ticket_No,a.c_Version,DATE_FORMAT(created_Time,'%Y%m01') as created_Time,a.dtsNum,a.closedNum,a.nopassNum, (CASE WHEN a.dtsNum = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (a.closedNum/a.dtsNum) END) AS resoRate from ( SELECT ticket_No, c_Version,created_Time, COUNT(*) AS dtsNum, COUNT(CASE WHEN curent_Status = '${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@CLOSE}' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS closedNum, COUNT(CASE WHEN failures >0 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS nopassNum FROM dts_log WHERE curent_Status != '${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@CANCEL}' AND (colse_Type IS NULL || colse_Type = '' || colse_Type='${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@CLOSURE_AFTER_CORRECTION}') and SUBSTRING(created_Time, 1,7) <= SUBSTRING(now(), 1,7) and SUBSTRING(created_Time, 1,7) >= SUBSTRING(date_add(NOW(), interval -2 month), 1,7) GROUP BY c_Version,DATE_FORMAT(created_Time,'%Y%m') )a

select ticket_No, c_Version,DATE_FORMAT(created_Time,'%Y%m01') as created_Time, 10*critNum+3*majNum+1*minNum+0.1*sugNum AS dtsLeaveDINum from ( SELECT ticket_No, c_Version,created_Time, COUNT(CASE WHEN severity = '${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@CRITIAL}' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS critNum, COUNT(CASE WHEN severity = '${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@MAJOR}' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS majNum, COUNT(CASE WHEN severity = '${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@MINOR}' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS minNum, COUNT(CASE WHEN severity = '${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@SUGGESTION}' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS sugNum FROM dts_log WHERE curent_Status != '${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@CANCEL}' AND curent_Status != '${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@CLOSE}' AND (colse_Type IS NULL || colse_Type = '' || colse_Type='${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@CLOSURE_AFTER_CORRECTION}') and SUBSTRING(created_Time, 1,7) <= SUBSTRING(now(), 1,7) and SUBSTRING(created_Time, 1,7) >= SUBSTRING(date_add(NOW(), interval -2 month), 1,7) GROUP BY c_Version,DATE_FORMAT(created_Time,'%Y%m')) a

SELECT ticket_No, c_Version,DATE_FORMAT(created_Time,'%Y%m01') as created_Time, 10*critialNum+3*majorNum+1*minorNum+0.1*suggestionNum AS TR5DI from ( SELECT ticket_No, c_Version,created_Time, COUNT(CASE WHEN severity = '${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@CRITIAL}' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS critialNum, COUNT(CASE WHEN severity = '${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@MAJOR}' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS majorNum, COUNT(CASE WHEN severity = '${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@MINOR}' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS minorNum, COUNT(CASE WHEN severity = '${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@SUGGESTION}' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS suggestionNum FROM dts_log WHERE curent_Status != '${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@CANCEL}' AND curent_Status != '${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@CLOSE}' AND (colse_Type IS NULL || colse_Type = '' || colse_Type='${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@CLOSURE_AFTER_CORRECTION}') AND defect_Found_Stage = '${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@SYSTEM_VERIFICATION_TEST_SVT}' and SUBSTRING(created_Time, 1,7) <= SUBSTRING(now(), 1,7) and SUBSTRING(created_Time, 1,7) >= SUBSTRING(date_add(NOW(), interval -2 month), 1,7) GROUP BY c_Version,DATE_FORMAT(created_Time,'%Y%m')) a

SELECT ticket_No, c_Version,DATE_FORMAT(created_Time,'%Y%m01') as created_Time, 10*critialNum+3*majorNum+1*minorNum+0.1*suggestionNum AS TR6DI from ( SELECT ticket_No, c_Version, created_Time, COUNT(CASE WHEN severity = '${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@CRITIAL}' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS critialNum, COUNT(CASE WHEN severity = '${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@MAJOR}' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS majorNum, COUNT(CASE WHEN severity = '${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@MINOR}' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS minorNum, COUNT(CASE WHEN severity = '${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@SUGGESTION}' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS suggestionNum FROM dts_log WHERE curent_Status != '${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@CANCEL}' AND curent_Status != '${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@CLOSE}' AND (colse_Type IS NULL || colse_Type = '' || colse_Type='${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@CLOSURE_AFTER_CORRECTION}') AND defect_Found_Stage in ('${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@BETA_TEST}', '${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@GA}', '${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@LIFT_CYCLE}', '${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@NETWORK_ENTRY_TEST}', '${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@TR5_GA}') and SUBSTRING(created_Time, 1,7) <= SUBSTRING(now(), 1,7) and SUBSTRING(created_Time, 1,7) >= SUBSTRING(date_add(NOW(), interval -2 month), 1,7) GROUP BY c_Version,DATE_FORMAT(created_Time,'%Y%m')) a

select ticket_No, c_Version,month,betaTestNum+SITNum+SVTNum as amountNum from ( select ticket_No,c_Version, DATE_FORMAT(created_Time,'%Y-%m-01') as Month, COUNT(CASE WHEN defect_Found_Stage = '${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@BETA_TEST}' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS betaTestNum, COUNT(CASE WHEN defect_Found_Stage = '${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@SYSTEM_INTEGRATION_TEST_SIT}' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS SITNum, COUNT(CASE WHEN defect_Found_Stage = '${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@SYSTEM_VERIFICATION_TEST_SVT}' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS SVTNum FROM dts_log WHERE curent_Status != '${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@CANCEL}' AND (colse_Type IS NULL || colse_Type = '' || colse_Type='${@com.icss.mvp.Constants@CLOSURE_AFTER_CORRECTION}') and SUBSTRING(created_Time, 1,7) <= SUBSTRING(now(), 1,7) and SUBSTRING(created_Time, 1,7) >= SUBSTRING(date_add(NOW(), interval -2 month), 1,7) GROUP BY c_Version,Month) a
